attack-object.name: Unsecured Credentials
attack-object.comments: Note there is also a Managed HSM service.
attack-object.score-comment: This control's protection is specific to a minority of this technique's sub-techniques and procedure examples resulting in a Minimal Coverage score and consequently an overall score of Minimal.

attack-object.name: Obtain Capabilities
attack-object.comments: Note there is also a Managed HSM service.
attack-object.score-comment: Provides protection against sub-techniques involved with stealing credentials / certificates / keys from the organization.

attack-object.name: Subvert Trust Controls

attack-object.score-comment: Provides protection against sub-techniques involved with stealing credentials / certificates / keys from the organization.
